title: Manassas National Battlefield Park: Guided Tours
body: Guided Tours         This soldier figure represents a member of the 5th New York Infantry Regiment.Â  Also called the "Duryee's Zouaves," they fought at the Second Battle of Manassas. NPS Photo  2016 SUMMER SCHEDULE:    First Manassas Programs  Matthews Hill Walking Tour Daily at 10 a.m.  Please meet at Tour Stop #4 (Matthews Hill).  Henry Hill Walking Tour Daily at 11 a.m., 2 p.m., & 4 p.m. Please meet at the Henry Hill Visitor Center    Second Manassas Programs  Brawner Farm Walking Tour: Daily at 11:15 a.m., 1:15 p.m. & 3:15 p.m. Please meet at the Brawner Farm Interpretive Center (Tour Stop #1).  Deep Cut Walking Tour Daily at 1 p.m.  Please meet at Tour Stop #7 (Deep Cut).  Chinn Ridge Walking Tour Daily at 3 p.m.  Please meet at Tour Stop #10 (Chinn Ridge).  Please note that this schedule is subject to change without notice.   The summer tour schedule is effective from May 29 - August 6, 2016.
